item.description:
The USAF Thunderbirds and Army Golden Knights will headline the 2008 Great New England Air Show at Westover Air Reserve Base, Mass., Sept. 6-7. Show starts at 9AM. Rain date Sep 7th.

Check out the show's website HERE

We will head out on the Mass Pike at 7:14 am from the Marriott Hotel in Newton, I may be taking my car if a non-scooter friend goes along too, otherwise I'll be scootin.

The following items are prohibited upon entrance to the air show:

-- Coolers (Security forces Airmen will only permit the entry of small coolers carrying life saving medicines or formula for young infants)
-- Loose ice
-- Cans
-- Glass
-- Alcohol
-- Pets (except service animals)
-- Weapons of any kind (to include pepper spray and other self-defense items), including WMD's.
-- Tents
-- Awnings
-- Cooking equipment
-- Roller blades, skateboards, razor scooters, bicycles

Still and video cameras are allowed, but owners should not load film prior to entering the installation. They may be required to open all compartments at the security checkpoint.

More information will be provided as soon as it becomes available.
item.name: Boston Big Iron: 2008 Great New England Air Show
